name: Neo-Tokyo Central
subtitle: Corporate Megacity
description: The heart of the corporate empire, where towering skyscrapers pierce the smog-filled sky and neon lights never sleep. This sprawling metropolis serves as the command center for the world's most powerful corporations, housing millions of workers in vertical cities that stretch toward the heavens.

places.name: Corporate Plaza
places.description: The central hub where all major corporate decisions are made. A massive complex of interconnected buildings reaching into the clouds.

places.name: Data Center Alpha
places.description: The primary data processing center that handles all corporate communications and surveillance data.

places.name: Underground Markets
places.description: Hidden beneath the corporate towers, these markets trade in everything the corporations don't want you to have.

name: Neo-Tokyo Outskirts
subtitle: Abandoned Districts
description: Once thriving residential areas, now abandoned and left to decay after the corporate consolidation. These districts have become havens for rebels, outcasts, and those who refuse to bow to corporate rule. The streets are filled with makeshift shelters and underground networks.

places.name: Rebel Hideout
places.description: A secret base where the resistance plans their operations against corporate control.

places.name: Resistance Base
places.description: The main headquarters of the anti-corporate resistance movement.

name: Industrial Zone 7
subtitle: Manufacturing Complex
description: A massive industrial complex where automated factories work around the clock to produce goods for the corporate empire. The air is thick with chemical fumes and the constant hum of machinery echoes through the metal corridors. Workers live in cramped dormitories adjacent to the production lines.

places.name: Factory Prime
places.description: The largest automated manufacturing facility in the zone, producing advanced technology components.

places.name: Chemical Processing Plant
places.description: Processes raw materials into industrial chemicals used throughout the manufacturing complex.

name: Wasteland Expanse
subtitle: Irradiated Badlands
description: A vast expanse of irradiated wasteland stretching beyond the horizon, created by decades of industrial pollution and experimental weapons testing. Mutated creatures roam these desolate lands, and strange phenomena occur where reality itself seems unstable. Only the bravest or most desperate venture into these cursed lands.

places.name: Mutant Colonies
places.description: Settlements of creatures changed by radiation, living in the ruins of the old world.

places.name: Energy Anomalies
places.description: Strange distortions in space-time where the laws of physics seem to break down.

name: Mining Station Beta
subtitle: Deep Core Extraction
description: A heavily fortified mining operation that extracts rare minerals from deep within the earth. The station operates in continuous shifts, with workers descending into dangerous tunnels that seem to go on forever. Strange discoveries have been made in the deepest levels, leading to increased security and secrecy.

places.name: Deep Shafts
places.description: Massive elevator systems that descend kilometers into the earth's crust.

places.name: Processing Center
places.description: Where extracted materials are refined and prepared for transport.

name: Frontier Settlement
subtitle: Last Outpost
description: The last bastion of civilization at the edge of the known world. This hardy settlement serves as a trading post for explorers, researchers, and anyone brave enough to venture into the unknown territories. Despite its remote location, it maintains communication with the outside world and serves as a beacon of hope.

places.name: Trading Post
places.description: The economic heart of the settlement where goods from across the wasteland are traded.

places.name: Research Station
places.description: A small but well-equipped facility studying the anomalies of the wasteland.
